Books Published

Here is a list of the books I have published over the years

2015

Fundamentals of Service Systems

Cardoso et al.. Springer 2015.

2014

Service Systems: Concepts, Modeling, and Programming

Cardoso, Lopes, and Geert. Springer 2014.

2009

Gestao de Workflows: Modelos, Metodos e Sistemas

Aalst and Hee (Translation: Cardoso). UC Press 2009.

2009

Handbook of Research on Business Process Modeling

Cardoso and Aalst. IGI Global 2009.

2008

Semantic Web Engineering in the Knowledge Society

Cardoso and Lytras. IGI Global 2008.

2008

The Semantic Web: Real World Applications from Industry

Cardoso, Hepp, Lytras. Springer 2008.

2008

Programacao de Sistemas Distribuidos em Java

Cardoso. FCA 2008.

2007

Semantic Web Services: Theory, Tools and Applications

Cardoso. IGI Global 2007.

2006

Semantic Web Services, Processes and Applications

Cardoso and Sheth. Springer 2006.
